caption.title: Relationships of the congruence between current and future climate suitability of threatened plant species with changes in climate suitability in all nature reserves under the low, medium, and high greenhouse gas concentration scenarios by both (A, C, E, respectively) the 2050s and (B, D, and F, respectively) the 2080s.
caption.p: C represents the changes in the climatic habitat suitability for threatened plant species. D represents the overlap between current and future climatic habitat suitability of threatened plant species in nature reserves.
